paths.name: Path of the Warlord
paths.summary: Victory is seized through presence, command, and unshakable fury.

feature.Name: Commanding Presence
feature.Description: Allies within 2 tiles gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Damage. When you drop an enemy to 0 Health, all nearby allies gain +2 Accuracy for 1 turn.

paths.name: Path of the Duelist
paths.summary: A blade perfected through grace, patience, and lethal precision.

feature.Name: Perfect Form
feature.Description: When wielding a single one-handed weapon, gain +3 Accuracy and +2 Damage. If you hit without being hit that round, regain 1 Health.

paths.name: Path of the Bloodmage
paths.summary: Power carved from flesh and paid for in blood.

feature.Name: Sanguine Casting
feature.Parameters: Once per Rest (Additional uses at Levels 6 and 12)
feature.Description: Spend up to 4 Health to add that much Damage or Healing to your next spell. If the spell kills an enemy, regain half the Health spent.

feature.Name: Voice of Thunder
feature.Description: Once per Rest, cast a Lightning spell as if it were one level higher. Lightning spells deal +1 splash Damage to nearby enemies.

feature.Name: Alpha Bond
feature.Description: You may control two animal companions simultaneously. Their attacks deal +1 Damage, and both gain +2 Accuracy when within 3 tiles of you.

paths.name: Path of the Wanderer
paths.summary: The road itself is your home.

feature.Name: Unbound Traveler
feature.Description: You cannot be ambushed. Movement speed +1 tile; after every combat, recover 1 Health and 1 Mana.

paths.name: Path of the Shadowblade
paths.summary: The perfect strike leaves no witness.

feature.Name: Silent Execution
feature.Description: While hidden, your first attack deals +4 Damage and cannot miss. After striking, you become invisible for 1 turn.

feature.Name: Master Manipulator
feature.Description: Charm one intelligent creature for 3 turns. Outside combat, you have advantage on negotiations and deals.

feature.Name: Unstoppable Mass
feature.Description: Gain +3 Armor and +2 Damage when below half Health. You cannot be knocked prone or forcibly moved.

feature.Name: Living Flame
feature.Description: Fire spells deal +2 Damage and ignite enemies for 1 extra Damage for 2 rounds.

paths.name: Path of the Frostwarden
paths.summary: The stillness of the glacier’s heart.

feature.Name: Glacial Guard
feature.Description: Ice abilities reduce enemy Speed by 1 tile and grant you +1 Armor for 1 turn per cast.

feature.Name: Undying Will
feature.Description: When reduced to 0 Health, regain 4 Health. While below half Health, your attacks deal +2 Damage.

feature.Name: Guardian’s Call
feature.Description: Heal all allies within 2 tiles for 2 Health. When defending others, gain +1 Armor and +1 Evasion until your next turn.

paths.name: Path of the Seer
paths.summary: You read the future like a flickering map.

feature.Name: Foresight
feature.Parameters: Once per Rest (Additional uses at Levels 6 and 12)
feature.Description: Predict the next attack or spell within 6 tiles. You or a chosen ally gain +4 Evasion against it.

paths.name: Path of the Chronomancer
paths.summary: You pull at the seams of time.

feature.Name: Temporal Surge
feature.Parameters: Once per Rest (Additional uses at Levels 6 and 12)
feature.Description: Take an additional action this turn. Gain 1 Fatigue at the end of combat.

feature.Name: Inevitable End
feature.Description: Deal +2 Damage to targets below half Health. When you kill an enemy, nearby foes suffer –2 Accuracy for 1 turn.

feature.Name: Battle-Hardened
feature.Description: Reroll one failed attack or defense roll. When an ally nearby fails an attack, they gain +2 Accuracy on their next strike.

feature.Name: Master Crafter
feature.Description: Repair equipment or create basic tools freely. Once per Rest, imbue an item with +1 Damage or +1 Defense for one combat.

paths.name: Path of the Hunter
paths.summary: You strike before fear sets in.

feature.Name: Predator’s Edge
feature.Description: Attacks against unaware or distant targets deal +2 Damage. Ignore movement penalties from rough terrain.

feature.Name: Deep Delver
feature.Description: Gain +2 Armor underground or in darkness. Blunt weapons deal +1 Damage and ignore 1 Armor.
